title: (x) good looking brush font - Balloon {Norbert}
content:
Hey, I have no idea what this is, but I see it everywhere. If anyone can tell me what this is then it would be great. Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_0222.JPG](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=IMG_0222.JPG) | 908.62 KB |
author: Sacha

comments.content:
there’s a really nice brush script called [Bello](http://web.archive.org/web/20051219071514/http:/www.underware.nl/site2/index.php3?id1=bello&id2=overview) by Underware.

::nc

Hey, thanks for the ID, I appreciate it. I have been looking for it for a while.

nc, yeah, bello is really nice, but Balloon has some serious street cred.

thanks again
